long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
User Scripts Manager is a powerful yet simple extension that lets you customize your browsing experience by injecting custom JavaScript into websites of your choice. Whether you want to modify website behavior, automate repetitive tasks, or enhance the functionality of a page, this extension gives you full control.

    How It Works:
        Write and save your custom JavaScript code for any website.
        Whenever you visit the specified website, your custom script will be executed automatically.

    Key Features:
        Full control: Create, manage, and apply scripts tailored to your needs.
        Secure and private: Your scripts are saved locally in Chrome and are only executed on the sites you specify.
        User-friendly: Easily manage your scripts through an intuitive interface.

The extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. Your customizations remain private and secure on your device.

Transform your browsing experience effortlessly with User Scripts Manager!
